prompt: Interior roller rink repurposed as emergency shelter: neon ceiling rings and faint disco halo; EXIT doors glowing amber from outside fires; boards lined with six folding cots; polished floor arcs and a center medallion bearing the sun insignia; two skater silhouettes glide through the shelter space; hidden gold key tag near a cot.
creator: jh

rights.notes: Internal concept artwork for Pop Song Summer. Do not redistribute without permission.
